purpose: To provide a desktop application that hosts and manages interactions with large language models (LLMs) using function calling capabilities.
principle: Builds on the concept of a multi-component platform (MCP) to facilitate communication and function execution between desktop applications and LLMs.
reusability: Modular architecture with support for plugins and APIs, allowing easy integration with different LLMs and function calling setups.
limitations: As an alpha release, it may have bugs and limited feature set; requires compatible LLMs with function calling support.
name: Dive
description: Dive is an open-source MCP Host Desktop Application that seamlessly integrates with any LLMs supporting function calling capabilities. âœ¨
highlight: Seamless integration with any LLMs supporting function calling capabilities.
